```{r}
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)

googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()


gewicht <- googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JCcH-AHe9fykagElfhSy6yOMHZlXYoGIi6oWHJkM21s/edit#gid=0")

# gewicht <- read_csv("gewicht.csv")

ggplot(gewicht, aes(Datum)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = Zebra, colour = "Zebra")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Zebra, colour = "Zebra"))   +
  geom_point(aes(y = Kalu, colour = "Kalu")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Kalu, colour = "Kalu")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = Puenktchen, colour = "Puenktchen")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Puenktchen, colour = "Puenktchen")) +
  labs(colour = "Ratte", y = "Gewicht (g)")

```
